mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "contract.id", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.name AS "name", a.price AS "price", a.num AS "num", a.unit AS "unit", a.amount AS "amount", a.remark AS "remark", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.sort AS "sort", a.product_type AS "productType.id", c.name AS "productType.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN oa_contract b ON b.id = a.contract_id LEFT JOIN oa_product_type c ON c.id = a.product_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_contract_product( id, contract_id, parent_id, name, price, num, unit, amount, remark, product_type, del_flag, create_by, sort, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contract.id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{num}, #{unit}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{productType.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_contract_product SET contract_id = #{contract.id}, parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, price = #{price}, num = #{num}, unit = #{unit}, amount = #{amount}, remark = #{remark}, sort = #{sort}, product_type = #{productType.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
